fields.label: Hide Configuration Menu
fields.name: hide_configuration_menu
fields.instructions: Hides the Configuration admin menu item.

fields.label: Hide Custom Fields Menu
fields.name: hide_custom_fields_menu
fields.instructions: Hides the Configuration admin menu item.

fields.label: Hide Page Libraries
fields.name: hide_page_libraries
fields.instructions: Hides the Page Libraries meta box.

fields.label: Hide Required Plugins Notice
fields.name: hide_plugins_notice
fields.instructions: Hides the required plugins admin notice.

fields.label: Editor Type
fields.name: enable_gutenberg
fields.instructions: This option is automatically updated based on if the Classic Editor plugin is installed & activated.

fields.label: jQuery Version
fields.name: jquery_version
fields.instructions: By default, WordPress uses an outdated version of jQuery that contains known security vulnerabilities. Use this option to override the default jQuery version (loaded from the Google CDN).

fields.label: Auto-load Foundation Component Libraries
fields.name: autoload_foundation_libraries
fields.instructions: By default, Foundation doesn't load any CSS or JS files to keep everything to a minimum & keep performance at a maximum. You can enable predefined Foundation component libraries globally as needed below.

fields.label: Auto-load Theme Component Libraries
fields.name: autoload_theme_libraries
fields.instructions: By default, Foundation doesn't load any CSS or JS files to keep everything to a minimum & keep performance at a maximum. You can enable predefined theme libraries globally as needed below.

fields.label: Types
fields.name: post_formats
fields.instructions: Select which post formats should be available.

fields.label: Additional Post Types
fields.name: supported_post_formats
fields.instructions: Select additional post types that support the selected post formats.

fields.label: Head Code
fields.name: head_code
fields.instructions: Define global code that appears in the <head> below.

fields.label: Footer Code
fields.name: footer_code
fields.instructions: Define global code that appears at the bottom of the site.

fields.label: Logo Size
fields.name: logo_size
fields.instructions: Site logos uploaded through the theme customizer require cropping by default. Enabling flex width or height allows bypassing cropping. If uploading an SVG, enable these options since SVG cannot be resized.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Expected logo width.

sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: Expected logo height.

sub_fields.label: Flex Width
sub_fields.name: flex_width
sub_fields.instructions: Whether to allow for a flexible width.

sub_fields.label: Flex Height
sub_fields.name: flex_height
sub_fields.instructions: Whether to allow for a flexible height.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: 0 will automatically calculate the width.

sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: 0 will automatically calculate the height.

sub_fields.label: Crop
sub_fields.name: crop
sub_fields.instructions: Crops the image to the specified size.

fields.label: Images Sizes
fields.name: images_sizes
fields.instructions: Add custom image sizes below.

sub_fields.label: ID
sub_fields.name: id
sub_fields.instructions: Alpha-numeric ID for the image size.

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a name for the image size.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: 0 will automatically calculate the width.

sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: 0 will automatically calculate the height.

sub_fields.label: Crop
sub_fields.name: crop
sub_fields.instructions: Crops the image to the specified size.

sub_fields.label: ID
sub_fields.name: id
sub_fields.instructions: Alpha-numeric ID for the menu.

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the name of the menu.

fields.label: Sidebars
fields.name: sidebars
fields.instructions: Create theme sidebars for widgets below.

sub_fields.label: ID
sub_fields.name: id
sub_fields.instructions: Unique alpha-numeric identifier.

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the name of the sidebar.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a short description for the sidebar.

sub_fields.label: Before Widget
sub_fields.name: before_widget
sub_fields.instructions: Opening tag for widgets.

sub_fields.label: After Widget
sub_fields.name: after_widget
sub_fields.instructions: Closing tag for widgets.

sub_fields.label: Before Title
sub_fields.name: before_title
sub_fields.instructions: Opening tag for widget titles.

sub_fields.label: After Title
sub_fields.name: after_title
sub_fields.instructions: Closing tag for widget titles.

fields.label: Color Palette
fields.name: gutenberg_color_palette
fields.instructions: Different blocks have the possibility of customizing colors. Choose a default color palette to pick from:

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: Appears in the tooltip of the color picker.

sub_fields.label: Slug
sub_fields.name: slug
sub_fields.instructions: Unique alpha-numeric identifier for the color, used to generate CSS classes.

fields.label: Disable Custom Colors
fields.name: disable_custom_colors
fields.instructions: When enabled, users will be restricted to the colors provided above.

fields.label: Font Sizes
fields.name: gutenberg_font_sizes
fields.instructions: Blocks may allow configuration of font sizes, e.g., the paragraph block. Set the defaults below:

sub_fields.label: Slug
sub_fields.name: slug
sub_fields.instructions: Unique alpha-numeric identifier for the size.

fields.label: Disable Custom Font Size
fields.name: gutenberg_disable_custom_font_sizes
fields.instructions: When enabled, users will be restricted to the font sizes provided above.

fields.label: Load Foundation CSS in Editor
fields.name: editor_load_foundation
fields.instructions: Loads selected global & page specific Foundation CSS in the editor.

fields.label: Load Theme CSS in Editor
fields.name: editor_load_theme
fields.instructions: Loads selected global & page specific theme CSS in the editor.

fields.label: Editor CSS
fields.name: editor_load_css
fields.instructions: Load additional CSS theme files in the editor below. Must be relative to the theme directory (ex. gulp-foundation/css/filename.css).

sub_fields.label: CSS Path (relative to the theme directory)
sub_fields.name: css_path

fields.label: Export Configuration
fields.message: Copy & paste the code below in the 'Import Configuration' textarea field to import the configuration settings.

fields.label: Import Configuration
fields.message: Paste the code below from the 'Export Configuration' textarea field to import configuration settings.
